name: Niki Estcourt
comment: Lovely staff at Luxury Comfort. This store sells the most beautiful watch. Great customer service and will be back!! Thank you

name: Josefa Attridge
comment: Hello. I'm using this watch since several months now. Simple watch. Works well. Really easy to install and use.

name: Augusto Kiddell
comment: It is a great watch. However, it will be greater adding a uploading pictures function. Thank you for the amazing watch.

name: Gaultiero Danes
comment: Hello. I'm using this app since several months now. Simple free app. Works well. Really easy to install and use.

name: Joela Chalmers
comment: The panel installation process was very slow because covid lock down, everything was professional from start to finish, good price for was I need

name: Hyatt Sudran
comment: Watch stopped working today, reviews and stars can't be seen. Will give 1 star until it's fixed. Watch works ok imo, it's a 5 star for me (when it works). edit: looks like it's fixed

name: Augustus Inge
comment: Every time a customer of mine leaves a review and I go to approve it, I get an error message saying the page doesn't exist. Please fix

name: Mac Binns
comment: Customers could leave a review upon purchasing an item on the site. But simple enough and effective enough.

name: Shel Amoss
comment: It is my first time using this watch. I imported 3 reviews but they are not showing up anywhere. Can someone help? Thank you.
